Een praktische training voor leidinggeve: A practical training for executives who dare to look at themselves
Wij helpen leiders van alle niveaus om d: We help leaders of all levels put the principles from Leading With and Without Ego into practice. We teach you to lead on the golden mean of control and letting go. You'll learn to shift between directive and servant leadership on a deep level, enabling you to do what it takes to lead a team to sustainable performance. Are you ready to take the next step in your leadership and challenge yourself?
HERKEN JE DEZE UITDAGINGEN? DAN PAST ONZ: DO YOU RECOGNIZE THESE CHALLENGES? THEN OUR TRAINING WOULD FIT
